title: JohnnyBTCSeed
author: JohnnyBTCSeed
created_time: May 17, 2016, 07:50:54 PMLast edit: July 09, 2016, 06:49:35 PM by JohnnyBTCSeed
content: Disclaimer [This is a satire card set, I can neither confirm nor deny that any of the information contained here is or is not factual]Welcome Bitcoiners,The Bitcoin ecosystem was built by a great variety of individuals. This deck seeks to give props to those who have stood out. It is by no means complete and I'm sure some have been missed, so I apologize if some of you didn't initially make it.This is a Bitcoin card set based on the VS System cards. This is an open source card deck, anyone can add to it. In fact I've never even played VS before, so I have no idea if the cards are balanced correctly. And most of the cards need to have powers added. So any and all suggestions for powers will be used. This was done using Magic Set Editor for anyone who wants to get creative and show me up Individual card downloads coming soonThis was all inspired by this threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=654861.msg7350820#msg7350820So without Further ado.....and in no particular order, except alphabetical..Tips:1J7QzjdzVtV7meR82eK2ByZUFL4fBUs3he

comments.author: Jhanzo
comments.body: Warren Buffet - Bitcoin Mirage? wth is that?Gavin Andresen - ookaaay..Mike Tyson - OVERPOWERED!LMAO at Kanye West and Bruno and Theymous.

comments.author: Lauda
comments.body: I have one suggestion, make the description larger. Depending on the resolution and screen size at the time of reading, it is quite hard to decipher without zooming in. I see a lot of potential in this satire, i.e. you can make it for 'known/trusted' community members of the forum.Oh, and my cat is disappointed that you've left it out.

comments.author: steven0021
comments.body: I almost missed it but what's that two big balls that the tentacle alien (aka satoshi) is holding? testicles?  Good work, by the way. It must've took some effort to make all of that.

comments.body: Quote from: steven0021 on May 17, 2016, 10:42:58 PMI almost missed it but what's that two big balls that the tentacle alien (aka satoshi) is holding? testicles?  Good work, by the way. It must've took some effort to make all of that.It's the flying spaghetti monster.  A classic case of a thing which is believed to exist although completely impossible to prove or identify.  Quite appropriate.
